channel.title: breakfast on Luke's Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in breakfast on Luke's Cookbook

item.title: Quiche
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading Deep dish pie crust Sour cream Eggs Cream Salt Pepper Cayenne Pepper Hearty Bits (Cook’s Choice) I tend to use whatever is left over in the kitchen Broccoli Peas Shredded Cheddar Onions Bacon Whatever tastes good Directions Prepare crust Pre-heat oven to 350F Take pie crust directly from freezer Gently poke holes in crust bottom without poking through pie tin or cracking crust Par-bake crust at 350F for 15 mins Prepare quiche Sautee any ingredients that require a little pre-cooking such as onions In a large bowl, mix eggs, sour cream, and cream together.

item.title: Fluffy Pancakes
item.description: Ingredients Dry 3 c All purpose flour 1/4 c Sugar 1 1/2 tsp salt 1 tbsp baking powder 1 1/2 tsp baking soda Wet 2 1/4 c milk 1/4 c vegetable oil 1 tbsp vanilla extract 1/4 c apple cider vinegar 1 (optional) 1 egg, reduce milk by 1/4 cup if adding egg Whipped salted butter 1 stick of salted butter at room temperature 1 tbsp cold water Directions Pancakes Mix dry and wet in separate bowls.
